name: Singularity (itch) (doomlightning)
description:
This is a game where you have to save a black hole from collapsing and drop itself by collecting the particles that escape from the endless loop of the rotating black hole.

Your goal is simple: survive as long as possible

To play all it takes is the mouse button and grab the particles before they run away from the screen.

Because I was busy, I wanted to add more, but in the end I had to deliver what you see now, I hope you enjoy.

It was built for the "black and white" jamegame

them loop consider the endless moving vortex partial in the blackhole.

All credit and construction, creation, drawing and programming is done by Doomlightning
